ValidationRule.description: Can't close a ticket without the approval submit date being populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK(Approval_Approved_Date__c) && (OR(ISPICKVAL(Ticket_Status__c,"Closed - Request Completed"), ISPICKVAL(Ticket_Status__c,"Closed - Not All Requests Complete"))) && $User.User_ID_18_Characters__c <> "0051300000CDkLOAA1"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't close a ticket that still in the approval process.
